talk.npckname: See fish species in fourth fish zone

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>[See fish species in First Fish Zone]</html>
<html>[See fish species in Second Fish Zone]</html>
<html>[See fish species in Third Fish Zone]</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fourth Fish zone$
[Magic level fish] Red Swordtail Carp, Calderock Golden Crucian, Gold-tailed Sweetfish, Spotted Carp, Angler Snakehead
[Rare level fish] Winter Carp, Big Rake Bass, Red Stone Moroko, Golden Carp, Stone-scaled Croaker
[Epic level fish] Crystal Smelt, Electric Eel, Golden Snakehead

$Second Fish Zone$
[Magic level fish]Maroon Coil Fish, Valley Grouper, Mountain Stream Fish, Neteyed Herring, Blue-scaled Bass
[Rare level fish] Small Herring, Red Trout, Black Striped Salmon, Calderock Mudskipper, Rockstone Clear Fish
[Epic level fish] Crystal Smelt, Electric Eel, Golden Snakehead

$Third Fish Zone$
[Magic level fish] Lake Smelt, Rock Whitebait, Sawtooth Croaker, Big-scaled Sweetfish, Red Bass
[Rare level fish] Winter Carp, Big Rake Bass, Red Stone Moroko, Golden Carp, Stone-scaled Croaker
[Epic level fish] Crystal Smelt, Electric Eel, Golden Snakehead

$First Fish Zone$
[Magic level fish] Calderock Trout, Rockstone Clear Fish, Foothills Crucian, Big Rake Salmon, Striped Crucian,
[Rare level fish] Small Herring, Red Trout, Black Striped Salmon, Calderock Mudskipper, Rockstone Clear Fish
[Epic level fish] Crystal Smelt, Electric Eel, Golden Snakehead
